com.epam.labs.dao

Class CarOrderDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.labs.dao.AbstractDAO<CarOrder>
      • com.epam.labs.dao.CarOrderDAO

  • public class CarOrderDAO
extends AbstractDAO<CarOrder>
    Class to implement all necessary methods to database access for order entity
